tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_contacts (
  contact_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  contact_name VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100),
  contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE contacts (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE companies (
  company_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  company_type VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100),
  contact_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (contact_id) REFERENCES contacts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
  communication_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  message TEXT,
  communication_date TIMESTAMP,
  sender_id INT,
  receiver_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES contacts(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES contacts(id)
);

CREATE TABLE stakeholders (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT NOT NULL,
email TEXT NOT NULL,
phone TEXT);

CREATE TABLE partners (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT NOT NULL,
email TEXT NOT NULL,
phone TEXT);

CREATE TABLE contacts (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
name TEXT NOT NULL,
email TEXT NOT NULL,
phone TEXT);

CREATE TABLE communications (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
contact_id INT NOT NULL,
partner_id INT NOT NULL,
message TEXT NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE stakeholders (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    role VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE partners (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone VARCHAR(20),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);
